thread.title: Ranji Trophy: Ravindra Jadeja rescues Saurashtra, Cheteswar Pujara falters
thread.title_full: Ranji Trophy: Ravindra Jadeja rescues Saurashtra, Cheteswar Pujara falters - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Ranji Trophy: Ravindra Jadeja rescues Saurashtra, Cheteswar Pujara falters
text:
*Rajkot:* Ravindra Jadeja, out of the Indian team, scored a timely 91 to help Saurashtra reach 270 for six on day one of their Group C match against Tripura in the Ranji Trophy here yesterday.
*Ravindra Jadeja. Pic/AP*
While Jadeja came to his team's rescue from 66 for three, Cheteswar Pujara (10) failed to get going. Another ... Â»
